==== Notes ====
For wireless, the Broadcom STA driver can be loaded from the Restricted Drivers Pop-up. The only problem found so far is that networking is disabled on each boot. This is easily enabled, but you still have to choose which AP to connect to wirelessly. The pass phrase is remembered between sessions, which is good.

Number pad fails to work "out of the box" in Lucid Alpha. I'm still working (as I'm able) to figure out the combination to bring it to 100%. I'll log here when I find it.

Number pad now works without issue in Lucid Beta.
